heisigStory: Two cocoons . . . mountain. Observe how the two vertical strokes of the mountain are extended upwards to serve as a kind of enclosure.
koohiiStory1: The villagers haven´t the faintest idea that giant coccoons resting in the mountain are soon to hatch.
koohiiStory2: Frodo and Sam fainted in the mountains and the spider wrapped them in cacoons.
kunYomi: ふか.い、かす.か、くら.い、しろ.い
words: 幽霊(ゆうれい): ghost, specter, apparition, phantom
